channel.title: Suzana Pires on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Suzana Pires on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Brazil’s Jorge Amado Novel ‘Tieta’ to Be Made Into Film With Suzana Pires, “Feminine Lens” (Exclusive)
item.description: The actress will also write the script, with Joana Mariani on board as director, and Eliane Ferreira’s Muiraquitã Filmes producing.
